name: TheDeadLine
description:
A game made in a week by Pavel Sergaziev and Denis Kotenko for the BlackThornProd Jam (0ctober 2018).

TheDeadLine is a runner/shooter where you need to gather the required number of code snippets while trying to not get caught by Oh My God It's The DeadLine (tm). You jump with 'spacebar', you aim with your mouse. There are items laying and floating about, they can either be good for you, or, instead, harmful. You can shoot FlashdriveRockets(R) with the left mouse button or try to catch items using the GrapplingMouse(tm) with the right mouse button.

It may seem pretty difficult at first, but if you time your jumps right and be very careful about what you destroy and what you pick up, with just a very little bit of luck you'll suceed.
